DOC.detailed_description: Financial coach new tool field community development , already demonstrate significant financial impact number study , include one randomized trial conduct Urban Institute . Financial coach improves participant financial literacy , budgeting , save financial emergency , debt level . The investigator ' project help clinician field community economic development understand health well-being new economic lens assess health-related impact emerge field financial coaching . The investigator partner financial coaching organization establish term `` Medical-Financial Partnership ( MFP ) '' offer financial coach improve financial mental health . The investigator evaluate MFP 's impact parent-rated child overall health 5 point likert scale ( Excellent Poor ) . Community-based participant recruit South Los Angeles randomize receive either monthly financial coaching plus access referral social service ( intervention ) access referral social service alone ( control ) . Inclusion criterion include dependent age 18 , form income , tax identification number ( social security number Individual Tax Identification Number ) . Participants survey quarterly regard parent-rated child overall health 5 point likert scale ( Excellent Poor ) .
